description: Employing the Mission Impossible genre, Agent Steve Hammond (non-sexual role) opens his file with pictures of good-looking studs, and the candidate's qualifications are big, thick pricks. Deciding the best man for the mission is a task Hammond relishes. He decides Dcota's thick, long dick is the right tool to take care of Lee Jennings, a mechanic who got a guy fired for sexually harassing him at work. Dcota is told, 'Fuck him down and dirty 'til he squeals.'
title: Mission Accomplished, Scene #01
